name: The Mather Group
tagline: We boost your sales and leads
description:
The Mather Group is a Digital Marketing Agency with over 25 years in the space. We help companies with SEO, PPC, Wikipedia & online reputation management. We have worked with cyber security companies, warehouse juggernauts, media moguls, and everything in between. Founded by Josh Greene, who has spent between $1-5 million annually online for the last decade.
Weâ€™ve managed online and DRTV programs for industry leaders such as Discovery Channel, Time Warner Cable, 1-800-PACK-RAT and Zipppy Shell, as well as helped a variety of smaller B2B and B2C businesses, and dramatically increased revenue everywhere. Josh has spoken at conferences ranging from the Mid Atlantic Marketing Summit to Search Engine Strategies to eTail.
